info.name: Circles
info.description:
# circlesdb A Nextcloud app that lets you play Circles. Circles is a game where you attempt to match all the coloured half circles by moving the big circles around. The computer will generate and shuffle a new puzzle, all you have to do is put it together like a jigsaw puzzle.
Drag pieces with a plus or line. Click pieces with a circle or curve. Need help? Take a look at the Tutorial Video: https://youtu.be/CwkhMN1WqD0
info.author: DerBen
